tools.tool_description: Returns a list of work items matching the request.
tools.title: works_list

argument_list.argument_description: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts
Filters for work created by any of these users
Filters for issues with any of the provided priorities. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3.
Filters for issues with any of the provided Rev organizations
The maximum number of works to return. The default is 50
Filters for work owned by any of these users
Filters for records in the provided stage(s) by name
Filters for tickets that need a response
Filters for tickets associated with any of the provided Rev organizations
Filters for tickets with any of the provided severities. Allowed values: blocker, high, low, medium
Filters for tickets with any of the provided source channels
Filters for work of the provided types. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task

tools.tool_description: Summarizes a list of objects. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail.
tools.title: summarize_objects

tools.tool_description: Returns a list of objects sorted by priority.
tools.title: prioritize_objects

argument_list.argument_description: A list of objects to be prioritized

tools.tool_description: Adds the given work items to the sprint
tools.title: add_work_items_to_sprint

argument_list.argument_description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.
The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added.

tools.tool_description: Given a search string, returns the ID of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the confidence is highest.
tools.title: search_object_by_name

argument_list.argument_description: The search string, for example, customer's name, part name, user name.

tools.tool_description: Returns the ID of the current sprint.
tools.title: get_sprint_id

tools.tool_description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.
tools.title: create_actionable_tasks_from_text

argument_list.argument_description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

tools.tool_description: Returns the ID of the current user.
tools.title: who_am_i

tools.tool_description: Returns a list of work items that are similar to the given work item
tools.title: get_similar_work_items

argument_list.argument_description: The ID of the work item for which you want to find similar items
